page.title: 17Education
page.content: On Wednesdays{each class}takes it in turn to{act plays in Assembly.}We go on{trips,}sometimes into town or much further away. We don't wear a{uniform here but we must{at the age of 11}when we move onto the{Neale Wade Community {College. { 1985}is a very important year for the {college}as it is{moving into brand new {buildings on the other side of town.It {will be the most up to date and best {equipped school in Cambridgeshire. The{old Hereward buildings}are in our area and they are now being emptied and everything moved to the new school. We don't know yet what will happen to the old buildings. We also have the{Community Centre}in our area where you can go to evening classes for a wide range of subjects. Lilian Lai.
